name: Turn A Blind Optic
description:
The war is over. Optimus is dead. The Decepticons have renounced their cause.
And, to make matters worse, Starscream is in the medbay again.

In which Bumblebee mistakes a consensual BDSM-relationship for abuse, and tries to save a rather bewildered Seeker.

A Transformers: Prime epilogue by Transformatron

Visual Novel adaptation by Useless19

Check out transformersvn.tumblr.com to ask questions or report bugs.

Note: This VN is rated M for one interrupted sticky sex scene. Nothing explicit is shown, though the text does have some overheard dirty talk. Please ask if you want more info.
